title: @riot why is this the only game that i get random super ping spikes that make the game unplayable??
body:
so many games ping is fine and out of nowhere 2k, 500, 300, 150, 5k, 100...
i really want to know why and how i can fix it. If i was to play any other game i'm fine with no ping issues, which i do not understand in the slightest.

replies.body:
Each game you play has servers that are located in a *different place* than League. This means your connection takes a different path to League than it does to any of those other games. This means that while you don't experience issues with any other games or services, you can still have issues getting to League's servers quickly or correctly. 

This issue is often caused by network routing to League specifically, so we can run a traceroute to figure out exactly where the issue is happening. First, though, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are fine before we start looking at everything outside of your network.

Let me know if this caused any change.
